trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_SEQ_00<tab>An Oroniri hunter would like to study your combat style.
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_000<tab>I gather from your peculiar attire that you are not from around here?

TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_001<tab>Very good. I have always been curious to observe a warrior from outside the Steppe in battle. You see, as a hunter, it is my duty to defend the Dawn Throne and the surrounding perimeter─especially against creatures known as chaochus.

TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_002<tab>As such, I am constantly searching for ways to improve my own fighting technique. I feel there is a lot I can learn by observing you. Please, if you are willing, meet me to the southwest of here. There you can demonstrate to me your combat style.
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_010<tab>This area is populated by chaochus. Please go and slay two. I shall carefully observe your movements from here.
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_011<tab>Please quickly go and slay two chaochus for me. I am anxious to see how you fight and if any of your techniques might be applied to my own.
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_020<tab>Over the course of my lifetime I have been exposed to many combat styles but never have I met anyone who fights with such fluidity and grace.

TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_021<tab>Today I have gained some valuable insight into the art of war and for that I would like to gift you with something of equal worth. Please, follow me.

TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_030<tab>The more I replay the scene of you facing the chaochus, the more I am impressed with just how refined your skills are. You even somehow managed to slay the creatures while leaving the flowers blossoming from their heads untouched.

TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_031<tab>Chaochu flowers are extremely precious to us and we often offer them up to Father Azim during certain ceremonies. Though, should they be missing even a single petal, it would ruin the gesture entirely.

TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_032<tab>While I have little difficulty in taking down these monsters, I often end up destroying their flowers in the process. I am confident that in incorporating a few of your techniques this can change.
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_033<tab>I shall not forget the knowledge you have bestowed upon me today. You have my sincerest thanks.
